comment._content: My father in low was sent to Germany "volonteer" with a gun pointed on his back,  he did not wear an uniform like those chaps above: the real volonteers. ( He was collecting bodies after the Berlin's bombings, and making long hours for no money in a factory)

Dear Ulrika, very shortsighted comment? Isn't there always someone at fault in a war? I'm sure you must be Danish!

comment._content: @kaandmar: Anne Frank was betrayed too, also by a Dutch person. 75% percent of Dutch jews were murdered, the highest percentage in western Europe.
